name: The "How-To-Notion" Wiki
description: Hey Champs!A lot of fellow creators have asked me in the past:"Felix, how do I do XYZ in Notion?"I gladly showed them how to do it and which resources to use, if they want to dive deeper into the topic.But that gave me a thought...Why don't I just create a Wiki with all the resources I used to get into Notion?So here we have it:The "How-To-Notion" Wiki!It includes:all the resources I used to get into Notion2 beginner guides in video and text formembedded Youtube videos and articlesa way to get r
features: all the resources I used to get into Notion; 2 beginner guides in video and text form; embedded Youtube videos and articles; a way to get regular updates, as soon as I learn something new on my journey (The Journey Package)
